title: Can anyone ID this sweet face?
content:
I came across this used on DTDigital’s site.  
 [http://www.dtdesign.com/brand.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015200059/http:/www.dtdesign.com/brand.aspx "http://www.dtdesign.com/brand.aspx")

I love it....can anyone ID it?

(image attached, many examples of it in use on their site for variety of positioning and brand statements)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015200059im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/digital_6619.jpg)

 [‹ please identify 'the scaffold' font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015200059/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41933 "Go to previous forum topic") [Can anyone ID this? It's on the tip of my tongue ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015200059/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41923 "Go to next forum topic")
author: g.turtle
